name: Quarantined (WilliamH)
description:
Quarantined is a prototype I developped in my free time over a period of 3 months.

In Quarantined you play as William, Lydiane and Olivier, 3 roommates who try to escape montreal by making their apartment fly away like in the movie "UP" by pixar. 

The world has ended and the few people left alive are isolated and trying to survive by looting food and water in what's left of civilization. William, Olivier and Lydiane have survived the pandemic by pure chance, they were too busy losing at their favorite online videogame.

This game was made by myself : William Homs
With additional design help from Olivier Dewyse.

Music : Walter Homs (Bear Lebowski on youtube)

THIS IS A PROTOTYPE

This has no save system and I have no intention of updating it with more content later on. 
The game is only playable on browser and can contain bugs. 

If you wish to support me or my work, feel free to donate.
However, if you can't / don't want to, feel free to play the game for free.
